::Cygnar::
       He finally leaves the Maximal base confident that he had made his 
point.  He transforms and takes off flying in a wide spiral.  This was for 
two equally important reasons.  The first, was that he could now see any 
pursuers from the Maximal base.  He doubted they would bother him but he felt 
the need for caution nonetheless.  The second reason was to confuse anyone 
trying to follow him, if they didn't already know where Galvatron's base was 
he wouldn't lead them there.

       Finally satisfied he flies back toward Galvatron's base.  Bored he 
opens fire on a small island inhabited by very small protohumans.  "Good-bye 
Lilliputians."  He then continues his flight home.

--part1_182.c6fb8b7.2a85c786_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
